title: The use of SWH system is recommended in the following type of buildings in Govt/Semi–Govt and Instit
clause_text: The use of SWH system is recommended in the following type of buildings in Govt/Semi–Govt and Institutional buildingswhere the hot water requirement may not be continuous/permanent: Laboratory and Research Institutions where hot water is needed Hostels of Schools and Colleges and other Institutes. The use ofSWH system may be allowed in any other building.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
